content.text:
# Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards 2024

| best_film      = Wicked
| best_director  = Brady Corbet – The Brutalist
| best_actor     = Colman Domingo – Sing Sing
| best_actress   = Mikey Madison – Anora
| last           = 2023
| next           = 2025
}}
The 23rd Washington D.C. Area Film Critics Association Awards winners were announced on December 8, 2024, presented to recognize the best of film in 2024.
Nominations were announced on December 7, 2024. The Brutalist led the nominations with ten, followed by Conclave with nine and Wicked with eight. The categories for Best Stunts and Best Motion Capture, as well as the Joe Barber Award for Best Portrayal of Washington, DC, were introduced.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Original Screenplay winner]]
, Best Voice Performance winner]]
The winners are listed first and in boldface.
